jobDescription: 5+ years of hands-on experience in predictive modeling and analysis in big data environments.Experience in advanced machine-learning methodologies (e.g. supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning etc.)Experience with clustered data processing (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Map-reduce, Hive)Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data setsExperience leading large-scale data warehousing and analytics projects, including using AWS technologies – Redshift, S3, EC2, Data-pipeline and other big data technologies.
